title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: An income support scheme providing ₹6,000 per year to all landholding farmer families in three equal installments.
benefits: ₹6,000 per year in three equal installments (₹2,000 each). Direct bank transfer (DBT) to registered farmers.
eligibility: All landholding farmer families across India. Excludes institutional land holders, families with members in constitutional posts, government employees, and those with income tax records.

title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban)
description: Provides affordable housing to the urban poor with subsidized home loans and direct assistance for house construction.
benefits: Subsidy on home loan interest rates up to ₹2.67 lakh or financial assistance up to ₹3.5 lakh for house construction.
eligibility: Economically Weaker Section (EWS), Low Income Group (LIG), and Middle Income Group (MIG). Applicant should not own a pucca house. Annual household income limits apply.

title: National Scholarship Portal (NSP)
description: A unified portal providing various scholarships offered by central and state governments to students from pre-matric to post-doctoral levels.
benefits: Financial assistance for education ranging from ₹500 to ₹20,000+ per annum depending on scholarship type.
eligibility: Varies by scholarship. Generally based on academic merit, community (SC/ST/OBC), family income, and state of residence.

title: National Social Assistance Programme (NSAP)
description: A comprehensive welfare programme providing monthly pensions to the elderly, widows, and disabled persons living in poverty.
benefits: Monthly pension (₹500-1000 depending on state). Includes IGNOAPS (Old Age), IGNWPS (Widow), and IGNDPS (Disability).
eligibility: Old Age: BPL aged 60+. Widow: BPL aged 40-79. Disability: BPL aged 18-79 with severe disability.

title: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
description: Guarantees 100 days of wage employment per financial year to rural households whose adult members volunteer for unskilled manual work.
benefits: Guaranteed wage employment at ₹382/day (rates vary by state). Creation of durable rural assets.
eligibility: Any adult member (18+ years) of a rural household willing to do unskilled manual work. Rural residency required.

title: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY)
description: The world's largest health insurance scheme providing health coverage to low-income families for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
benefits: Health coverage of up to ₹5 lakh per family per year (₹10 lakh for elderly family heads). Covers hospital and post-hospitalization care.
eligibility: Based on socio-economic caste census (SECC) database. Check eligibility on official portal using mobile/Aadhaar.

title: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
description: Provides collateral-free loans to micro and small business entrepreneurs for starting or expanding their business.
benefits: Loans up to ₹10 lakh without collateral. Shishu (up to ₹50,000), Kishor (₹50,000-₹5 lakh), Tarun (₹5-10 lakh).
eligibility: Indian citizens aged 18+ with a business plan. No collateral or security required. Small/micro-enterprise sector.

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: Provides free LPG gas connections to below poverty line households for clean cooking fuel access.
benefits: One free LPG connection per eligible household. First refill and safety equipment provided by government.
eligibility: BPL and APL households without existing LPG connections. Households with at least one female member (preferably) get priority.

title: Pradhan Mantri Vaya Vandana Yojana (PMVVY)
description: Pension scheme for senior citizens (60+ years) providing guaranteed pension through Life Insurance Corporation (LIC).
benefits: Monthly, quarterly, half-yearly, or annual pension. Interest rate of 7.40% p.a. guaranteed for 10 years. Lump sum return after maturity.
eligibility: Indian citizens aged 60 years or above. Minimum investment ₹1.5 lakh.

title: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY)
description: Savings scheme for girl child offering attractive interest rates and tax benefits under Section 80C.
benefits: Interest rate of 7.6% p.a. (subject to change). Tax benefits under Section 80C. Compound annual interest.
eligibility: Girl child below 10 years of age. Only two accounts per female child allowed.

title: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
description: Pension scheme for unorganized sector workers providing guaranteed monthly pension from age 60.
benefits: Fixed pension of ₹1000-5000 per month from age 60 onwards. Government co-contribution of 50% of contribution for 5 years.
eligibility: Indian citizens aged 18-40 years. Unorganized sector workers (shopkeepers, self-employed, etc.).

title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Rural)
description: Provides financial assistance for construction of pucca houses for BPL families in rural areas.
benefits: Financial assistance up to ₹2.67 lakh per household for house construction. Free trained labor assistance.
eligibility: BPL families in rural areas not owning pucca house. Vulnerable populations (SC/ST) prioritized.

title: Janani Shishu Suraksha Karyakram (JSSK)
description: Program ensuring free and safe delivery services for pregnant women at public health facilities.
benefits: Free delivery services at government hospitals. Free transport for pregnant women to health facilities.
eligibility: All pregnant women delivering at public health centers. No income limit.

title: Mid Day Meal Scheme
description: Provides nutritious meals to school children to improve nutrition, school attendance, and learning outcomes.
benefits: Free nutritious meal during school days. Improves health and academic performance of children.
eligibility: All children in government and aided schools from class I to VIII.

title: Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS)
description: Holistic program providing nutrition, health checkups, and pre-school education to children below 6 years.
benefits: Free nutritious meals, health checkups, immunization, and early childhood education.
eligibility: Children aged 0-6 years from all communities. Pregnant and lactating women also covered.

title: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana
description: A rural road development program providing all-weather road connectivity to unconnected villages.
benefits: All-weather rural roads for connectivity and transport.
eligibility: Rural villages without existing road connectivity.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
description: A financial inclusion program offering zero-balance bank accounts for citizens.
benefits: Zero balance account, RuPay card, accidental insurance of ₹2 lakh.
eligibility: All Indian citizens with valid ID.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
description: Financial inclusion program providing zero balance bank accounts and insurance benefits.
benefits: ₹1 lakh accident insurance, free RuPay card, overdraft facility.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance scheme for farmers to protect against natural calamities.
benefits: Insurance at low premium of 2% for Kharif and 1.5% for Rabi crops.

title: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana
description: Scheme to provide all-weather road connectivity to rural areas.

title: PM POSHAN (Mid-Day Meal 2.0)
description: Free cooked meals for school children to improve nutrition.

title: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana
description: Free ration to poor families.
benefits: 5 kg food grains per person per month.

title: PM UDAY Yojana (Delhi Unauthorized Colonies)
description: Property rights for people living in unauthorized colonies.

title: Mission Karmayogi
description: Skill enhancement platform for government employees.

title: PM SVANidhi
description: Loans for street vendors to support their business.

title: Nikshay Poshan Yojana
description: Nutrition support for TB patients.

title: Swadhar Greh Scheme
description: Support for women in difficult circumstances.

title: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
description: Promotes girl child education and welfare.

title: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushal Yojana
description: Skill development for rural youth.

title: Udyam Registration
description: Registration for MSMEs to avail benefits.

title: National Rural Livelihood Mission (NRLM)
description: Self-help groups formation and income support.

title: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY)
description: Savings account for girl child's education.

title: Pradhan Mantri Vaya Vandana Yojana
description: A pension scheme for senior citizens with guaranteed returns.

title: Atal Pension Yojana
description: Pension scheme for unorganised sector workers.

title: Pradhan Mantri Janman Yojana
description: Tribal welfare scheme launched for PVTGs.
eligibility: Members of Particularly Vulnerable Tribal Groups.

title: POSHAN Abhiyaan
description: Nutrition improvement mission for children and mothers.

title: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme
description: Promotes apprenticeship among youth.

title: Skill India Mission
description: Skill training program across India.

title: Stand Up India
description: Supports SC/ST and women entrepreneurs.

title: Start-up India
description: Supports startups with funding and incubation.

title: Udyog Aadhaar
description: MSME registration made simpler.

title: PM-KUSUM
description: Solar pumps & grid-connected solar plants for farmers.
benefits: Subsidy up to 60% for solar pumps.

title: UJALA Yojana
description: Affordable LED bulbs for all.

title: Poshan Shakti Nirman
description: Nutrition scheme for women and children in MP.

title: Shramik Setu Portal
description: Welfare scheme for MP labourers.

title: Free Bicycle Scheme
description: Free bicycles for girl students.

title: Samagra ID Yojana
description: Unified citizen ID for accessing MP schemes.

title: Ladli Laxmi Yojana
description: Financial aid for girl child from birth to marriage.

title: Balika Samridhi Yojana
description: Supports girl children through education incentives.

title: Mukhyamantri Kanya Utthan Yojana
description: Financial incentive at every stage of girl's education.

title: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme
description: Monthly pension for senior citizens below poverty line.

title: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana
description: Maternity benefit program providing financial support to pregnant women.
eligibility: Pregnant and lactating women above 19 years.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Aushadhi Yojana
description: Affordable generic medicines to all citizens.

title: One Stop Center Scheme
description: Support to women facing violence.

title: Formation & Promotion of 10,000 FPOs
description: Support to farmer producer organizations.

title: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Provides soil nutrient status for better farming.

title: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana
description: Accident insurance scheme with low premium.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
description: Life insurance with annual premium.

title: Swachh Bharat Mission
description: Sanitation and cleanliness mission.

title: PM Gati Shakti
description: Infrastructure connectivity program.

title: Digital India Program
description: Transforming India into a digitally empowered society.

title: BharatNet
description: High-speed broadband to rural areas.

title: Grain ATM Scheme
description: Automated ration dispensing machines.

title: Antyodaya Anna Yojana
description: Highly subsidized food grains for poorest families.
benefits: 35 kg grains per family per month.

title: Unique Disability ID (UDID) Scheme
description: Single disability ID card for differently-abled persons.

title: Shramev Jayate Program
description: Welfare scheme for laborers.

title: Ladli Laxmi Yojana
description: Financial support for girl child from birth to higher education in Madhya Pradesh.
benefits: Around ₹1.4 lakh total in multiple stages.
eligibility: Girl child born in MP to eligible families as per state norms.

title: Mukhyamantri Jan Kalyan (Sambal) Yojana
description: Social security scheme for unorganized workers in MP.
benefits: Support in case of accidental death, normal death and disability, along with other benefits.
eligibility: Unorganized workers registered under the scheme.

title: MP Krishak Sajhedari Yojana
description: Encourages participation of farmers and private sector in agriculture infrastructure.
benefits: Subsidy and support for agriculture infrastructure projects.
eligibility: Farmers and FPOs in Madhya Pradesh.

title: Shiv Bhojan Thali
description: Subsidized food thali for the poor in Maharashtra.
benefits: Cooked meal at very low cost in designated canteens.
eligibility: Open to all, primarily targeted at poor and workers.

title: Bal Sangopan Yojana
description: Support for children who have lost one or both parents.
benefits: Monthly financial assistance for child welfare.
eligibility: Children from vulnerable families as per scheme norms.

title: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Shetkari Sanman Yojana
description: Farm loan waiver scheme in Maharashtra for eligible farmers.
benefits: Waiver of outstanding crop loans as per limits set by the state.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers in Maharashtra, as per guidelines.

title: Mukhyamantri Kanya Sumangala Yojana
description: Financial assistance for girl child at different life stages in Uttar Pradesh.
benefits: Total support up to ₹15,000 in multiple installments.
eligibility: Girl children of UP domiciled families meeting income criteria.

title: UP Ration Portability Scheme
description: Allows ration card holders in UP to draw ration from any FPS within the state.
benefits: Improved access to PDS grains for migrants and workers.
eligibility: Valid ration card holders of Uttar Pradesh.

title: UP Mukhya Mantri Gramodyog Rojgar Yojana
description: Employment generation through village industries in UP.
eligibility: Rural youth and entrepreneurs from UP meeting criteria.

title: Pudhumai Penn Scheme
description: Incentive scheme for girls pursuing higher education in Tamil Nadu.
eligibility: Girls from government schools joining higher education.

title: Amma Unavagam
description: Low-cost food canteens in Tamil Nadu for the poor and working class.
eligibility: Open to all citizens in TN.

title: Tamil Nadu Farmers' Pension Scheme
description: Pension support scheme for registered farmers in TN.
eligibility: Farmers with valid registration as per state norms.

title: Krishi Bhagya Yojana
description: Supports rain-fed farmers with farm ponds and irrigation structures.
benefits: Subsidy for farm ponds, pumps and irrigation equipment.

title: Udyogini Scheme (Karnataka)
description: Financial assistance to women entrepreneurs for small businesses.
benefits: Subsidised loans for eligible women beneficiaries.
eligibility: Women entrepreneurs from economically weaker sections.

title: Yeshasvini Health Insurance Scheme
description: Health insurance for cooperative sector members in Karnataka.
eligibility: Members of cooperative societies in Karnataka.

title: MahaLabharthi Portal
description: Online portal to help citizens find and apply for Maharashtra govt schemes.

title: UP Widow Pension Scheme
description: Monthly pension scheme for destitute widows in Uttar Pradesh.
eligibility: Widows from economically weaker sections of UP.

title: TN Destitute Old Age Pension
description: Pension for indigent senior citizens in Tamil Nadu.
eligibility: Senior citizens meeting income and residence criteria.

title: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
description: National campaign to improve child sex ratio and promote education for the girl child.
benefits: Awareness activities, local incentives, support for girl education.
eligibility: All districts and communities as per scheme rollout.

title: Swadhar Greh
description: Provides shelter, food, clothing and care to women in difficult circumstances.
benefits: Temporary shelter, medical care, counseling and rehabilitation.
eligibility: Women without social or economic support as per scheme norms.

title: One Stop Centre Scheme
description: Support to women affected by violence with integrated services.
benefits: Police facilitation, legal aid, counseling, temporary shelter.
eligibility: Women facing domestic, social or workplace violence.

title: Mahila E-Haat
description: Online marketing platform for women entrepreneurs and SHGs.
benefits: Digital marketplace visibility and direct selling.

title: Nari Arthik Sashaktikaran Scheme
description: Financial empowerment initiatives for women through loans and self-help groups.
eligibility: Women from eligible income groups and SHGs.

title: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana
description: Maternity benefit scheme for pregnant women.
eligibility: Pregnant and lactating women for first living child.

title: Ujjawala Scheme (Trafficking Prevention)
description: Prevention of trafficking and rescue, rehabilitation, reintegration of victims.
benefits: Shelter, counseling, legal aid, vocational training.
eligibility: Women and girls who are victims of trafficking.

title: Support to Training and Employment Programme for Women (STEP)
description: Provides skills that give employability to women and competencies to become self-employed.
benefits: Free skill development and livelihood support.
eligibility: Women from 16 years and above, especially from disadvantaged groups.

title: Stand Up India for Women
description: Supports women entrepreneurs with bank loans.

title: NRLM Women SHG Support
description: Formation and support to women Self Help Groups in rural areas.
benefits: Revolving funds, credit linkages and capacity building.
eligibility: Rural poor women organised under SHGs.

title: MP Ladli Laxmi Yojana
description: State scheme to promote girl child education and welfare in MP.
benefits: Multiple deposits and lump sum at 21 years.
eligibility: Girl children fulfilling MP government conditions.

title: Mahila Kisan Sashaktikaran Pariyojana
description: Empowers women farmers through groups and livelihood support.
eligibility: Women farmers in selected project areas.

title: Vidya Lakshmi Education Loan Portal
description: Single window platform for education loans, heavily used by girl students too.
benefits: Access to multiple bank loan schemes in one portal.
eligibility: Students seeking education loans for higher studies.

title: PMAY Urban – Women Co-ownership
description: Promotion of women as co-owner/owner in housing under PMAY(U).
benefits: Subsidy on home loans; preference for women ownership.
eligibility: Urban poor eligible under PMAY guidelines.

title: Sukanya Samriddhi Account
description: Long-term savings for girl child's education and marriage.
benefits: High interest rate and tax benefits.
eligibility: Girl child below 10 years with guardian.

title: Janani Suraksha Yojana
description: Safe motherhood intervention under NHM to reduce maternal mortality.
eligibility: Pregnant women, especially BPL and SC/ST.

title: UP Kanya Sumangala / Utthan Type Schemes
description: Comprehensive financial support for girl child in Uttar Pradesh.
benefits: Cash benefits at birth, school and higher education stages.
eligibility: Girl children of eligible families in UP.

title: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Income support scheme for small and marginal farmers.
eligibility: Small and marginal landholding farmers as per scheme norms.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
description: Crop insurance scheme protecting farmers against crop loss.
benefits: Low premium crop insurance for Kharif, Rabi and commercial crops.
eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas.

title: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Provides soil test based recommendations to farmers.
benefits: Soil nutrient status report and fertilizer advice.

title: Kisan Credit Card
description: Affordable credit facility for farmers.
benefits: Short-term crop loans at subsidised interest rate.
eligibility: Farmers engaged in agriculture and allied activities.

title: PM-KUSUM
description: Solar pump and grid-connected solar power initiative.
benefits: Subsidy for installation of solar pumps and plants.

title: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana
description: Promotes organic farming through cluster approach.
benefits: Support for organic input, certification and marketing.

title: National Agriculture Market (e-NAM)
description: Online trading platform for agricultural commodities.
benefits: Better price discovery and transparent auctions.
eligibility: Registered farmers and traders in participating mandis.

title: FPO Formation and Promotion Scheme
description: Support for creating 10,000 Farmer Producer Organizations.

title: Dairy Entrepreneurship Development Scheme
description: Support for dairy farms, chilling units and other dairy activities.
benefits: Back-ended capital subsidy for eligible components.
eligibility: Farmers, SHGs, NGOs and companies as per guidelines.

title: Gramin Bhandaran Yojana
description: Construction of scientific storage godowns in rural areas.

title: MP State Crop Insurance Add-on
description: State-level enhancement over central crop insurance schemes.
benefits: Additional compensation in case of crop loss.

title: Jalyukt Shivar Abhiyan
description: Water conservation scheme to make villages drought-free.
benefits: Farm pond, embankments and water structures support.

title: Krishi Bhagya (Karnataka)
description: Support to dry-land farmers with farm ponds and irrigation.
benefits: Subsidy on construction of farm ponds and allied infrastructure.
eligibility: Farmers in rain-fed regions of Karnataka.

title: UP Kisan Udyog Yojana
description: Encourages agro-based industries for farmers in Uttar Pradesh.
benefits: Subsidy on capital investment for agro units.
eligibility: Eligible farmers and entrepreneurs in UP.

title: TN Farmers' Social Security Scheme
description: Pension and welfare for registered farmers in Tamil Nadu.

title: Input Subsidy for Natural Calamity
description: Compensation to farmers for crop damage during notified natural calamities.
benefits: Per-hectare monetary support for damaged crops.

title: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
description: Flagship scheme for skill development of youth.
benefits: Free short-term training and certification in various trades.

title: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushal Yojana
description: Placement-linked skill program for rural youth.
benefits: Residential training, stipend and placement support.
eligibility: Rural youth from poor households aged 15–35.

title: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme
description: Promotion of apprenticeship training for youth.
eligibility: Youth 14+ as apprentices and willing employers.

title: Startup India Seed Fund & Support
description: Support for young entrepreneurs and startups.

title: National Career Service (NCS) Portal
description: Job matching portal for youth with counseling and career guidance.
benefits: Online job search, career counseling and skill courses.
eligibility: Job seekers and employers across India.

title: Skill India Mission
description: Umbrella mission for skill development initiatives.

title: State Mega Job Fair Initiatives
description: Job fairs for youth connecting employers and job seekers.
eligibility: Unemployed youth registered on state portals.

title: Tamil Nadu Skill Development Mission
description: Skill training programs aligned to industry needs in TN.
eligibility: Youth of Tamil Nadu as per scheme guidelines.

title: Koushalya Karnataka
description: Skill training initiative for unemployed youth in Karnataka.
benefits: Free training with stipend in some courses.

title: UP Skill Development Mission
description: Skill training for youth in Uttar Pradesh.
eligibility: Youth from UP meeting eligibility norms.

title: Maharashtra Rojgar Melava
description: Job fairs and online placement drives in Maharashtra.
eligibility: Registered job seekers in the state.

title: Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan Programs
description: Youth development through volunteerism and community programs.

title: National Service Scheme (NSS)
description: Service-based learning program for college students.
benefits: Certificates, preference in some recruitments, leadership skills.
eligibility: Students enrolled in NSS units of colleges/universities.

title: Digital India Programme
description: Flagship program to transform India into a digitally empowered society.
benefits: Digital infrastructure, governance and services on demand.

title: UMANG App Services
description: Unified Mobile Application for New-age Governance.
benefits: Access to multiple govt services in one app.

title: BharatNet
description: Optical fibre connectivity to gram panchayats.
benefits: High-speed internet backbone in rural areas.
eligibility: All gram panchayats under project coverage.

title: DigiLocker
description: Digital document wallet for citizens.
benefits: Secure storage of Aadhaar, PAN, certificates, etc.

title: BHIM UPI App
description: Mobile payment app using Unified Payments Interface.
benefits: Instant bank-to-bank transfers with UPI ID or QR code.
eligibility: Citizens with bank account and mobile number.

title: Common Services Centres (CSC)
description: Digital access points for various government services in villages.
benefits: Online services like certificates, bill payments, banking.

title: e-SHRAM Portal
description: National database for unorganised workers.
benefits: UAN-based identity and access to social security schemes.

title: mKisan Portal & SMS Service
description: Mobile-based advisory service for farmers.
benefits: SMS alerts on weather, crops and market prices.

title: Digital Agriculture Mission
description: Uses digital technologies like AI and remote sensing for agriculture.
benefits: Better advisory, credit access and insurance.

title: ABHA & Digital Health ID
description: Digital Health ID for storing health records.
benefits: Easy access and sharing of medical records.
eligibility: Citizens opting for digital health ID.

title: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
description: Flexible support to states to strengthen agriculture and allied sectors.
benefits: Funding for infrastructure, tech adoption, training, and agri innovation.
eligibility: Farmers, FPOs, cooperatives, and agriculture startups.

title: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
description: ₹1 lakh crore fund for post-harvest and agri-infrastructure.
benefits: Interest subsidy up to 3% and credit guarantee support.
eligibility: Farmers, FPOs, startups and agri entrepreneurs.

title: Minimum Support Price Procurement Scheme
description: Government buys crops at MSP to protect farmers from market crashes.

title: Kisan Mitra Urja Relief Scheme
description: Financial relief for electricity bills of farmers in Rajasthan.
benefits: Monthly subsidy on agricultural electricity usage.
eligibility: Registered farmers with agricultural electricity connections.

title: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture
description: Promotes horticulture crops, nurseries, and cold chain.
benefits: Subsidy for orchards, greenhouses, micro-irrigation and storage.

title: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
description: Promotes climate-resilient agriculture practices.
benefits: Support for soil conservation, rainwater harvesting, micro-irrigation.

title: Price Support Scheme for Pulses & Oilseeds
description: Procurement of pulses and oilseeds at MSP via NAFED.
benefits: Assured price and prevention of distress selling.

title: Kisan Suryoday Yojana
description: Daytime electricity for irrigation in Gujarat.

title: Haryana Kisan Loan Waiver Scheme
description: Loan relief for small and marginal farmers.
benefits: Waiver of overdue crop loans for eligible farmers.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers in Haryana.

title: National Bamboo Mission
description: Boosts bamboo cultivation and bamboo-based industry.
benefits: Support for nurseries, plantations and processing units.

title: UP Pashudhan Bima Yojana
description: Insurance coverage for cattle and livestock in UP.

title: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana
description: Supports fisheries sector with subsidy and infrastructure.
benefits: Subsidy for pond construction, equipment and cold chain.

title: West Bengal Krishak Bandhu
description: Income support and insurance for farmers.
eligibility: Farmers owning cultivable land in West Bengal.

title: YSR Rythu Bharosa
description: ₹13,500 yearly financial support for farmers.
benefits: Income support and free crop insurance.

title: Telangana Rythu Bandhu
description: Direct investment support for farmers per acre.

title: Karnataka Raitha Siri
description: Special support for millet farmers.

title: Raitha Vidya Nidhi
description: Scholarship for children of farmers.
eligibility: Children of registered farmers in Karnataka.

title: MP Mandi Fee Waiver Scheme
description: Mandi fee waiver for certain crops during excess stock periods.

title: Maharashtra Fruit Mission
description: Boosts fruit cultivation and drip irrigation in Maharashtra.

title: Assam Orunodoi
description: Income support scheme benefiting rural families including farmers.

title: J&K Seed Capital Fund
description: Seed capital for agriculture entrepreneurship.
benefits: Financial assistance for agri startups and youth.
eligibility: Youth farmers & agri startups in J&K.

title: Seed Minikit Distribution Scheme
description: Free distribution of seeds for pulses and oilseeds.

title: DBT in Fertilizers
description: Fertilizer subsidy reaches farmers digitally through PoS machines.

title: Greenhouse & Polyhouse Subsidy Scheme
description: Subsidy for setting up greenhouses, shade nets and poly houses.

title: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization
description: Subsidy for purchasing tractors, power tillers and farming tools.
eligibility: All farmers, special benefits for SC/ST and women.

title: Solar Crop Dryer Subsidy Scheme
description: Promotes solar-based dryers for crops.
benefits: Up to 60% subsidy on solar dryers.

title: FASAL Rahat Yojana (Jharkhand)
description: State crop relief scheme covering non-PMFby crops.
benefits: Compensation for crop loss without premium.

title: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Direct income support of ₹6,000 per year to farmers.
benefits: ₹2,000 every 4 months directly to bank account.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers with cultivable land.

title: Ayushman Bharat - PMJAY
description: World's largest health insurance scheme.
benefits: ₹5 lakh health insurance per family per year.
eligibility: Economically weaker families as per SECC database.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
description: Crop insurance protecting farmers from natural calamities.
benefits: Low premium crop insurance for all major crops.

title: PM Awas Yojana - Urban
description: Affordable housing for urban families.

title: PM Awas Yojana - Rural
description: Housing support for rural households.

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
description: Free LPG connections to women below poverty line.
benefits: Free LPG connection + subsidy on refills.

title: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
description: Small business loans up to ₹10 lakh.

title: MGNREGA Job Guarantee
description: 100 days of paid employment for rural workers.
eligibility: Any adult in rural areas willing to do manual work.

title: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: Savings scheme for girl child.

title: Atal Pension Yojana
description: Pension scheme for unorganised sector.

title: ICDS – Child Development
description: Nutrition & preschool education for children.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
description: Zero-balance bank accounts for all households.

title: E-Shram Card
description: National database for unorganised workers.
benefits: UAN ID + eligibility for welfare schemes.

title: PM Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
description: Life insurance scheme with low premium.

title: PM Suraksha Bima Yojana
description: Accident insurance for ₹20/year.

title: National Social Assistance Programme
description: Pension for elderly, widows, and disabled.

title: PM Poshan (Mid-Day Meal)
description: Nutritious meals for school children.

title: National Pension Scheme (NPS)
description: Voluntary retirement savings scheme.

title: MahaDBT Scholarship
description: State scholarship portal for Maharashtra students.

title: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
description: India's flagship skill development scheme for youth.
benefits: Free short-term training, certification & placement assistance.

title: Startup India
description: Flagship initiative to build a strong startup ecosystem.
benefits: Tax exemptions, funding support, mentorship & incubation.

title: PM Mudra Yojana for Youth
description: Collateral-free loans for young entrepreneurs.
benefits: Loans up to ₹10 lakh (Shishu, Kishor, Tarun categories).

title: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
description: Placement-linked skill training for rural youth.
benefits: Free residential training, stipend & guaranteed placement.
eligibility: Rural youth aged 15-35 from poor families.

title: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS)
description: Learn while you earn through apprenticeship.

title: Stand Up India
description: Bank loans for SC/ST and women entrepreneurs.

title: National Career Service (NCS) Portal
description: One-stop job portal connecting youth with employers.
benefits: Free job search, career counseling & skill courses.

title: National Scholarship Portal (NSP)
description: Single platform for all government scholarships.
eligibility: Students from Class 1 to PhD level.

title: PM Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)
description: Credit-linked subsidy for setting up micro enterprises.
benefits: 15-35% subsidy on project cost up to ₹50 lakh.

title: Central Sector Interest Subsidy Scheme
description: Interest subsidy on education loans for economically weaker students.
benefits: Full interest subsidy during moratorium period.
eligibility: Students with family income below ₹4.5 lakh.

title: Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan (NYKS)
description: Youth development through community participation.

title: National Service Scheme (NSS)
description: Community service programme for college students.

title: Vidya Lakshmi Education Loan Portal
description: Single window for education loans from multiple banks.
benefits: Easy comparison & application for education loans.

title: Agnipath Scheme (Agniveer)
description: Short-term recruitment in Armed Forces.

title: PM Internship Scheme
description: Internship opportunities for youth in top companies.
eligibility: Youth aged 21-24 from lower income families.

title: Skill India Digital Hub
description: Free online skill courses and certifications.
benefits: Access to 600+ free courses & digital certificates.

title: Free Coaching for SC/ST/OBC/Minorities
description: Free coaching for competitive exams like UPSC, Banking, SSC.

title: Ishan Uday Scholarship (North East)
description: Scholarship for students from North Eastern states.
eligibility: Students from NE states with family income < ₹4.5 lakh.

title: PM YASASVI / Swanath Scholarship
description: Scholarship for OBC, EBC & DNT students.

title: Rozgar Mela (Employment Fair)
description: Mega recruitment drives by PM for government jobs.
benefits: Direct recruitment to central government posts.
